articles.title: Mobile Billboard Global Announces Major Milestone with the Launch of Mobile Billboard Global
articles.summary: Mobile Billboard Global launched its global services after a successful rollout in Miami. The company now offers custom mobile billboards to clients worldwide, leveraging personalized mobile marketing. Their services include LED billboard trucks and real-time digital content updates for various marketing campaigns.

articles.title: I ran, raved, and road-tripped with Ray-Ban Meta glasses — I'm still shocked by these AI features
articles.author: Miska Salemann
articles.summary: Meta launched the second generation of its Wayfarer smart glasses, featuring improved battery life, faster transfers, and crisper camera resolution. The Ray-Ban Meta Wayfarer (Gen 2) includes an AI assistant, hands-free photo and video capture, open-ear speakers, and integration with apps like Strava, offering a blend of style and functionality for everyday use.

articles.title: Here Are The Items That Make Cleaning Easier For Me
articles.author: Griffin Wynne
articles.summary: The article introduces cleaning products and tools available from companies like Amazon and Bissell. Products such as standing dustpans, Scotch-Brite dish brushes, Bissell ReadyClean cordless vacuums, Amazon Echo Pop, Mrs. Meyer's room spray, Dawn dish soap, disposable food-serving gloves, Bounty paper towels, cleaning caddies, wooden crates, trays, shell dishes, hard-sided grocery bags, trash cans, front door stations, and Hot Shot ant traps are introduced and described. These products are presented as aids to make cleaning easier and more efficient.

articles.title: I Swapped My Flatiron for This $15 Mousse—And My Hair Has Never Been Healthier
articles.author: Jamie Wilson
articles.summary: Several brands offer mousse products designed for curly hair, each with unique features and benefits. These mousses include ingredients like hydrolyzed amaranth protein, plum oil, and pink Bolivian salt, targeting moisture, hold, frizz control, and volume. They are designed to enhance natural hair texture and offer various styling options, as highlighted in reviews.

articles.title: 10-inch Samsung tablet gets £130 discount in early Black Friday sale
articles.author: Joshua Boyles
articles.summary: Wowcher offers a refurbished Samsung Galaxy Tab S2 at a discounted price of £59. Amazon has the Samsung Galaxy Tab A9 available for £102.99, reduced from £126.95.

articles.title: Pixel phone calls just got a major glow-up - see for yourself
articles.author: ZDNet
articles.summary: Google released a Pixel phone update enhancing existing features.

articles.title: LG Rolls Out Its ThinQ AI Into a Sleek New Crew of Connected Home Helpers
articles.summary: Amazon is offering a smart discount on the front Load LG Washer with AI. The front Load LG Washer with AI is highly sought after and features a special promotion banner on the e-commerce site.

articles.title: VERTU Black Friday Event The Time to Invest in Luxury Tech Is Now
articles.summary: VERTU has launched its 'Black Friday x 27th Anniversary Grand Celebration,' offering discounts on its smartphones like Metavertu Max (25% off), Metavertu Curve (40% off), and iVertu. The event also highlights the newly launched Agent Q, the anniversary flagship featuring AI capabilities and a unique design, along with a tiered VIP Rewards program based on purchase amount.

articles.title: The Dyson V9 Motorbar is on sale for its cheapest price to date for limited time
articles.author: Breanna Manley
articles.summary: Dyson V9 Motorbar is being offered at a discounted price of $269.99, down from $599.99, for a limited time on Amazon. The cordless vacuum includes attachments such as a crevice tool, hair screw tool, and motorbar cleaner head, and boasts a 40-minute runtime, whole-machine filtration, and the ability to transform into a handheld vacuum.

articles.title: BlipCut Launches Free AI Voice Generator to Create Realistic Commercial Voices
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: BlipCut has launched BlipCut AI Voice Generator, a new feature designed to instantly turn text into high-quality, natural-sounding voiceovers in 40+ languages. The AI Voice Generator offers 600+ realistic AI Voices, emotion and style control, and allows commercial use, making it ideal for audiobooks, podcasts, e-learning, and global marketing campaigns.

articles.title: 30 Must-Have Travel Products For Your Next Trip
articles.author: Ashley Schumacher
articles.summary: I Dew Care launched "Tap Secret" mattifying powder shampoo for quick hair refreshing. Gillette released an on-the-go razor with a case. Alleyoop introduced a portable travel razor featuring a triple-blade, moisturizing bar, and refillable spray bottle. Neutrogena offers solid SPF 50 sunscreen stick and individually wrapped makeup removing wipes. Liki Trike is offering a trike stroller which fits in overhead bins.

articles.title: Verizon will give you a free Samsung 4K TV right now - how the deal works
articles.author: ZDNet
articles.summary: Verizon is offering a free Samsung TV (or another gift) with a sign-up for their 5G Home Ultimate plan as an early Black Friday deal. This promotion is related to the launch or promotion of a service.

articles.title: The Truth Behind Verizon's 'Free Phone' Initiative - Is It Worth It?
articles.author: Sarah Bloomfield
articles.summary: Verizon is offering a "free phone" to new customers or those upgrading their existing Apple, Google, Samsung, or Motorola phones. To qualify, customers must enroll in Verizon's Unlimited Ultimate phone plan for 36 months at a minimum of $90 per month, with auto-pay enabled. The phone's cost can't exceed $1,099.99, and a $1,100 promo credit is applied monthly.

articles.title: Pamela Anderson's limited-edition lip balm is perfect for the holidays: ‘A reflection of love'
articles.author: Erica Radol
articles.summary: Pamela Anderson's Sonsie launched a limited-edition Basic Balm in Sugar-Dipped Rhubarb, inspired by her childhood memories. This new lip balm, which joins Sonsie's skincare lineup, features a shimmer and vegan formula to smooth, moisturize, and firm lips and is available in a giftable set with the original balm.

articles.title: Chery-owned Lepas to differentiate itself with the help of fashion brands
articles.author: Andrew Maclean
articles.summary: Chery will launch Lepas, its third new sister brand, in Australia in the middle of 2026. This launch represents a new product introduction for Chery in the Australian market.

articles.title: PR Newswire Enhances Platform with AI-Powered Content Optimization
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: PR Newswire is enhancing its PR Newswire Amplify™ platform with new artificial intelligence (AI) driven capabilities. These updates aim to improve content creation, optimization, and measurement, helping brands ensure their stories are discoverable by relevant readers and AI systems. The updated platform includes tools that streamline the process of creating engaging and optimized content.

articles.title: Shop the Dyson cordless vacuum that's 55% off before Black Friday
articles.author: Victoria McDonnell
articles.summary: Dyson is offering the V9 Motorbar vacuum cleaner at a 55% discount. The V9 Motorbar is a lightweight, cordless vacuum featuring a Hyperdymium motor with 100 Air Watts of suction and an automatically adapting Motorbar cleaner head. The vacuum also has an LCD screen that displays mode, remaining runtime and any maintenance alerts.

articles.title: BlipCut Releases Free AI Voice Generator to Create Realistic Commercial Voices
articles.author: Blip Cut
articles.summary: BlipCut announced the release of BlipCut AI Voice Generator, a new feature designed to help creators, brands, and businesses instantly turn text into high-quality and natural-sounding voiceovers. This new feature brings fast, multilingual, and commercially usable voice generation to everyone, ideal for audiobooks, podcasts, e-learning, and global marketing campaigns.

articles.title: Reseller Web Hosting - cPanel/WHM/WHMCS  NVMe SSD Space  Free SSL  Emails
articles.author: Web Hosting Talk
articles.summary: The offering includes features like Unlimited GB NVME SSD, cPanel, WHM, Unlimited Bandwidth, Subdomains, Addon Domains, and MySQL, typically associated with web hosting services.

articles.title: KEENON Robotics Unveils C55 Cleaning Robot at ISSA North America Expo, Showcases Full-Scene Portfolio
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: KEENON Robotics unveiled its C55 cleaning robot, designed for large indoor areas, at the ISSA North America Expo. The C55 integrates sweeping, scrubbing, and suction with features like triple-roller dry-wet separation, powerful suction, and a 360° perception system for obstacle avoidance. In addition to the C55, KEENON also showcased its full range of robots including the C40, C30, W3, T10, and S300.

articles.title: KEENON Robotics Unveils C55 Cleaning Robot at ISSA North America Expo, Showcases Full-Scene Portfolio Français
articles.author: Keenon Robotics
articles.summary: KEENON Robotics has launched the C55, a professional medium-to-large area sweeping and scrubbing robot, at the ISSA North America Expo. The C55 is designed for indoor environments over 3,000㎡, combining sweeping, scrubbing, and suction, and includes features like enhanced cleanliness, ultra efficiency, and smart operation. This launch is part of KEENON's strategy to deliver integrated robotics solutions for businesses.

articles.title: KEENON Robotics Unveils C55 Cleaning Robot at ISSA North America Expo, Showcases Full-Scene Portfolio
articles.author: Keenon Robotics
articles.summary: KEENON Robotics introduced the C55, a professional medium-to-large area sweeping and scrubbing robot, at the ISSA North America Expo. The event also showcased KEENON's existing products such as the C40 and C30 cleaning robots, the W3 hotel robot, the T10 delivery robot, and the S300 transport robot.

articles.title: Splat® Hair Color Launches Limited-Edition Batman™ Collaboration
articles.author: DEVELOPLUS
org: Warner Bros. Discovery Global Consumer Products
articles.summary: Splat Hair Color and Warner Bros. Discovery Global Consumer Products launched the Batman x Splat collaboration, a new line of hair color kits inspired by Batman characters. This limited-edition collection combines hair color with comic book themes.

articles.title: Score $400 off the Dreame Aqua10 Ultra Roller Vacuum ahead of Black Friday
articles.author: Emma Sutton-Williams
articles.summary: Dreame is offering a 25% discount on the Aqua10 Ultra Roller, a new home cleaning device. The Aqua10 Ultra Roller features a real-time fresh water mopping system, FluffRoll technology, AutoSeal, ProLeap retractable legs, OmniSight 2.0 navigation, and hot water mop pad cleaning with hot air drying.

articles.title: Need Lana Turner or Babe Ruth to Send You a Voice Note? This AI Firm Has You Covered
articles.author: The Hollywood Reporter
articles.summary: Audio tech company ElevenLabs is launching a new product or service.

articles.title: Amazon's like-new Kindle Paperwhite Signature Edition is on sale for just $127
articles.author: Brandon Russell
articles.summary: Amazon is selling the Kindle Paperwhite Signature Edition in like-new condition. The Signature Edition offers wireless charging, auto-adjusting front light, a 7-inch display with 300ppi resolution, an IPX8 rating, an ad-free experience, and 32GB of storage.

articles.title: The 43 Best Christmas Gifts for Every Type of Sister
articles.author: Brenley Goertzen
articles.summary: Owala launched a new stainless-steel tumbler designed for both hot and cold beverages that fits into car cupholders. Claudia Sulewski's brand Cyklar offers a body oil containing vitamin C for dehydrated skin. Garmin released the new Garmin 570 GPS watch featuring a built-in microphone and speaker for phone calls from the wrist.

articles.title: 2026 Mercedes-Benz GLB interior revealed before its debut next month
articles.author: Marton Pettendy
articles.summary: Mercedes-Benz is testing the new 2026 GLB model in extreme cold weather. The world premiere is scheduled for December 8, with an Australian launch planned for the second half of next year.

articles.title: Amazon shoppers rush to get hands on foldable hairdryer reduced to £30
articles.summary: Amazon is offering the Foldable Ionic Hair Dryer for £29.98, reduced from £49.99. The hairdryer features adjustable speed and temperature settings, and includes a diffuser and concentrator nozzle. Customer reviews indicate positive experiences with its performance and portability.

articles.title: Baidu launches AI smart glasses
articles.author: Shenzhen Daily
articles.summary: Baidu launched its Xiaodu Pro AI smart glasses on JD.com and Tmall. Priced at 2,299 yuan (US$322), the glasses offer photography, real-time translation, object recognition, voice memos, and AI-powered reminders.

articles.title: AliExpress Unveils Faster Shipping, Brand+ Channel, New AI Tools, and Big Savings During 11.11 Shopping Festival
articles.author: Pr Newswire
articles.summary: AliExpress is introducing faster delivery options (2-8 days) for select items and launching Brand+, a dedicated channel for trusted international brands. AliExpress is also enhancing its shopping experience with new AI tools and the "Shake & Win" challenge, offering shoppers a chance to win prizes. Moreover, AliExpress is collaborating with PayPal to provide additional discounts for U.S. shoppers during the Singles' Day sale.

articles.title: Hornets Unveil New City Edition Remix Uniform & Court For 2025-26 Season: ‘Hoopers Paradise'
articles.author: Queen City News
articles.summary: The Charlotte Hornets, in association with Judi Health, unveiled a new Nike NBA City Edition Remix uniform. This uniform will be worn by the team.

articles.title: Block Reign, Inc. Showcases Momentum Around the Gnodi Blockchain
articles.author: HJ News
articles.summary: A people-first network is delivering products and services using blockchain technology. The specific products and services are not detailed, but the use of blockchain implies innovation.

articles.title: Your guide to South Africa's best beauty retailers for skincare, makeup and more
articles.author: Ntombi Khulu
articles.summary: EGG Beauty, an offshoot of We Are EGG, launched as a platform for local and women-owned beauty brands. Beauty on TApp, founded in 2015, has expanded to four physical stores to empower women-owned beauty brands such as Portia M and Afrobotanics. These retailers enhance the accessibility and visibility of local beauty products.

articles.title: The easiest way to send and receive Android texts on your Windows PC - for free
articles.author: ZDNet
articles.summary: Microsoft enables Android phone syncing with Windows 11 PCs via Phone Link. The feature facilitates calling, texting, and instant photo sharing.

articles.title: Verizon will give you a Samsung 4K TV for free right now - here's how ...
articles.author: ZDNet
articles.summary: Verizon is offering a free Samsung TV or another gift with a sign-up for their 5G Home Ultimate plan as part of an early Black Friday promotion.

articles.title: 'Lush has launched skin-friendly make-up and this product exceeded all my expectations'
articles.author: Laura Mulley
articles.summary: Lush has introduced a new makeup line, including tinted moisturizers, primers, and concealers. The article specifically reviews the Skinwear Tinted Moisturizer, priced at £16, noting its moisturizing feel and light coverage.

articles.title: COSRX Unveils New 5 PDRN Vital Care Collection and Upgraded Vitamin C 23 Serum on Amazon US
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: COSRX launched its new 5 PDRN Vital Care line, featuring a toner, serum, and hydrogel mask designed to restore skin elasticity and calm irritation, along with a renewed Advanced Vitamin C 23% Serum with enhanced texture and a clean formula. These products are available exclusively on Amazon.com, with a 20% discount offered during COSRX's Black Friday & Cyber Monday Event.

articles.title: Knix Expands into Men's Market with New Brand MNTD
articles.summary: Knix has launched MNTD, a new line of men's essentials. This represents Knix's first expansion into men's apparel, blending innovation, comfort, and freshness.

articles.title: InventHelp Inventor Develops New Line of Flavored Noodles (HOF-294)
articles.author: Invent Help
articles.summary: An inventor has created STREET FLAVORS NOODLES. The product is a noodle dish designed for quick preparation offering an alternative to traditional noodle cups.

articles.title: SmartFinds Marketing Launches SmartPress for B2B Visibility and Credibility
articles.author: Smartfinds Marketing
articles.summary: SmartFinds Marketing launched SmartPress, a new press release marketing service tailored for B2B brands seeking visibility and credibility. SmartPress combines strategic storytelling, SEO optimization, and global distribution. To celebrate the launch, SmartFinds Marketing is offering 50% off any SmartPress release purchased before December 31, 2025.

articles.title: SmartFinds Marketing Launches SmartPress for B2B Visibility and Credibility
articles.author: Smart Finds Marketing
articles.summary: SmartFinds Marketing launched SmartPress, a press release marketing service tailored for B2B brands aiming for increased visibility and credibility. SmartPress aims to provide B2B companies with media exposure comparable to that of major corporations.

articles.title: SmartFinds Marketing Launches SmartPress for B2B Visibility and Credibility
articles.author: Smart Finds Marketing
articles.summary: SmartFinds Marketing launched SmartPress, a new press release marketing service for B2B brands. SmartPress aims to provide B2B companies with the same media exposure as major corporations.

articles.title: GoPro launches MAX2, LIT HERO and Fluid Pro AI for Indian creators
articles.author: Indian Express
articles.summary: GoPro launched MAX2 and LIT HERO, new products focused on content creators, in India.

articles.title: Startale launches ‘super app' for Sonieum blockchain
articles.author: BTC Manager
articles.summary: Startale Group has introduced a new 'super app'. The super app is designed to function as an all-in-one platform.

articles.title: Starburst Teams Up with Snowflake and Industry Leaders to Drive Open Data and AI Interoperability Through the Open Semantic Interchange
articles.author: Starburst
articles.summary: Starburst is joining the Open Semantic Interchange (OSI) to create a universal specification for standardizing fragmented data definitions. OSI aims to enhance interoperability across tools and platforms by offering a vendor-neutral specification for consistent metrics and definitions. This initiative is expected to unify business metrics and accelerate AI innovation.

articles.title: Pamela Anderson's limited-edition lip balm is perfect for the holidays: ‘A reflection of love'
articles.author: Erica Radol
articles.summary: Pamela Anderson's brand, Sonsie, has launched a new limited-edition lip balm called 'Basic Balm in Sugar-Dipped Rhubarb'. The balm features a vegan, squalane-packed formula with a peptide complex for smoothing and moisturizing lips, and a microplastic-free shimmer. It is available individually and as part of the Basic Balm Duo gift set.

articles.title: OOLIE SET TO EXPAND BEYOND STORE SHELVES WITH NATIONWIDE DIRECT-TO-CONSUMER LAUNCH
articles.author: Ein News
articles.summary: Oolie is launching its direct-to-consumer platform at ooliefoods.com, offering consumers nationwide access to their dips and yogurts. The new platform offers options such as build-your-own boxes and sample packs, with flavors including yellow curry, garlic and herb, Mediterranean tomato, spicy pepper, red beet bliss, vanilla, key lime, berry blend, and banana cream.

articles.title: Shaina Rainford: Building a $10M+ Haircare Brand Solo
articles.summary: Bask & Lather Co. launched in 2020 with a focus on scalp health and natural ingredients, addressing the root causes of hair issues. Their product line originated from a personal need to heal a scalp condition and expanded when the founder experienced hair loss. The company is poised for continued growth through global expansion and deeper innovation in hair loss solutions and natural haircare.

articles.title: Samsung Vision AI: Bixby Upgrade for 2025 TVs
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Samsung is launching Vision AI Companion, a generative AI upgrade to Bixby, across its 2025 TV lineup. This technology analyzes on-screen content, allowing real-time questioning and information retrieval. The initial rollout supports 10 languages, offering viewers a more interactive and immersive television experience.

articles.title: Samsung's Galaxy Z Fold7 and Flip7 bring AI to everyday tasks
articles.author: Kanika Budhiraja
articles.summary: Samsung is launching the Galaxy Z Fold7 and Galaxy Z Flip7. The Galaxy Z Fold7 focuses on productivity with its expansive screen, generative editing capabilities, and a built-in assistant for calls and screen sharing. The Galaxy Z Flip7 enhances the outer screen functionality for quick tasks and information access, emphasizing user convenience and privacy controls.

articles.title: Kornerz Replaces the Doomscroll with 'Real Conversation'
articles.author: Ein News
articles.summary: Kornerz has introduced a new "Real Conversation" section, enhancing user experience by allowing them to see online "Kornerstones" and "Klouderzs" within a Korner and the number of spots remaining. This feature aims to foster genuine conversations and build meaningful connections, replacing the traditional feed with curated thematic communities.

articles.title: Steve Jobs launches the $29 iPod Socks.
articles.author: Thomas Ricker
articles.summary: Steve Jobs launched iPod Socks for $29. Apple introduced the socks as a new accessory for its devices, offered at a lower price than its new iPhone Pocket.

articles.title: HawkSearch Powers Advanced Product Discovery for National Distributor to JanSan and Food Service Professionals
articles.author: Joplin Globe
articles.summary: Bridgeline Digital, Inc. announced that a national distributor has successfully launched HawkSearch, its AI-powered product discovery platform, on their e-commerce website. This launch utilizes HawkSearch's native integration with the Optimizely Configured Commerce platform to deliver faster and more relevant product discovery for customers.

articles.title: Shark Beauty™ Expands to Walmart, Bringing its Advanced Beauty Tech and Salon-Quality Results to More Consumers Than Ever Before
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: SharkNinja has launched Shark Beauty products on Walmart.com, making salon-quality beauty technology accessible to more consumers. Shoppers can now purchase innovations like the Shark FlexStyle® Air Styling & Drying System and Shark SpeedStyle™ Hair Dryer on Walmart.com with two-day shipping.

articles.title: Shark Beauty™ Expands to Walmart, Bringing its Advanced Beauty Tech and Salon-Quality Results to More Consumers Than Ever Before
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: SharkNinja, Inc. has launched Shark Beauty™ on Walmart.com. This launch aims to broaden access to Shark Beauty's innovative beauty technology and products for consumers.

articles.title: Auto Hrvatska opens BYD centre in Split
articles.author: Annie Tsoneva
articles.summary: Auto Hrvatska announced the opening of a new BYD center in Split, Split-Dalmatia county. This expansion signifies BYD's full presence in the new location and commitment to providing customers with a top-notch experience.

articles.title: Motorola Edge 70 Launch Date, Price In India, Specifications, Design, Colors And More: All Leaks
articles.summary: Motorola is preparing to introduce the Motorola Edge 70 in India, succeeding the Edge 60. The Motorola Edge 70 features a Qualcomm Snapdragon 7 Gen 4 chipset, up to 12GB RAM, 512GB storage, a 6.67-inch pOLED Super HD display, and a 4800 mAh battery with 68W fast charging. The expected launch price in India is between Rs 35,000 - Rs 40,000, with an anticipated release in early 2026.

articles.title: 34 Fun Desk Accessories To Upgrade Your WFH
articles.author: Rebecca O'Connell
articles.summary: NeeDoh launched a new product named Groovy Jewel fidget toy. The toy is designed to be squeezed and stretched for stress relief.

articles.title: SA-built Chinese BAIC B30 launched in SA
articles.author: Business Day
articles.summary: A new mid-size SUV alternative has debuted. The SUV is available with conventional and hybrid engine options, marking the introduction of a new vehicle model to the market.

articles.title: TECNO begins 5-day countdown to the launch of the MEGAPAD and SPARK Slim
articles.author: Class
articles.summary: TECNO is launching two new devices: the MEGAPAD and the SPARK Slim. The MEGAPAD is designed for professionals and creators, offering high-performance technology. The SPARK Slim is celebrated as the world's slimmest 3D curved AI smartphone, featuring a 1.5K AMOLED display, 50MP AI main camera, and AI-powered tools. Pre-orders for the SPARK Slim are open from November 5 to 14.

articles.title: Nuu Mobile B40 5G Full Specs, Features, Price In Philippines
articles.author: Cris Sayson
articles.summary: Nuu Mobile officially announced the B40 5G smartphone in the fourth quarter of 2025. The phone features a 6.7-inch AMOLED display, a MediaTek Dimensity 7025 processor, 8GB of RAM, 256GB of storage, a dual-camera setup with a 64-megapixel main sensor, and a 16-megapixel front camera.

articles.title: Printful Launches All-Over Cotton Collection in Canada: A New Era for On-Demand Apparel
articles.summary: Printful has launched its All-Over Cotton Collection, offering vibrant, edge-to-edge designs on premium cotton garments. This collection eliminates the compromise between bold colors and comfort, providing creators, brands, and enterprises the ability to print on high-quality cotton fabrics. The Printful All-Over Cotton Collection is now available worldwide to all Printful users.

articles.title: US man 'Markled' after receiving wickless Rs 5,756 candle from Meghan Markle's brand
articles.summary: Meghan Markle launched her new lifestyle brand with the 'Signature Candle'. A political commentator unboxed the $65 candle and discovered it was missing a wick. The defective product sparked mixed reactions on social media.

articles.title: Lava Agni 4 Launch in India on November 20, Tipped To Feature 7,000mAh Battery; Check Expected Price and Specifications
articles.author: Team Latestly
articles.summary: Lava is launching its new smartphone, the Lava Agni 4, in India on November 20. The Lava Agni 4 is powered by the MediaTek Dimensity 8350 processor and may feature a 6.67-inch AMOLED display, a 50MP main camera, and a 7,000mAh battery with 66W fast charging.

articles.title: Printful Launches All-Over Cotton Collection: A New Era for On-Demand Apparel
articles.summary: Printful has launched its All-Over Cotton Collection, a new print-on-demand service that allows for vibrant, edge-to-edge designs on premium cotton garments. This collection offers cotton tees and cotton-rich fleece using Direct-to-Fabric printing, available to all Printful users worldwide.

articles.title: If Your Cleaning Vibe Is "Push It Off As Long As Possible," You'll Want These 27 Products
articles.author: Jessica Hall
articles.summary: The article showcases a variety of cleaning products from different companies designed to simplify and improve household cleaning tasks. These include Scrubbing Bubbles toilet cleaning stamps, The Pink Stuff's Miracle Multipurpose Cleaner Spray, Dawn Powerwash, Bissell's Little Green cleaner, and Eufy robot vacuum, among others, offering solutions for various cleaning needs around the house.

articles.title: "Clean, Soften & Protect" — This 3-in-1 Laundry Solution Does It All In Just One Wash
articles.author: Dale John Wong
articles.summary: Daia launched its new 3-in-1 Softergent, combining cleaning, fragrance, and antibacterial protection in one bottle. The product features Smart ION Technology to prevent dirt from reattaching to clothes and a long-lasting scent crafted by international perfume experts. Neelofa endorses the product.

articles.title: Tech Gaint Solution Pvt. Ltd. Officially Launches WOOOW AI -- Empowering India's Digital Future with an All-in-One AI Platform
articles.author: ANI
articles.summary: Tech Gaint Solution Pvt. Ltd. (TGSPL) has commercially launched its flagship All-in-One Artificial Intelligence platform, WOOOW AI. This platform integrates multiple AI-driven tools, enabling users to create, automate, and innovate. WOOOW AI includes tools like AI Presentation Creator, AI Image Generator & Editor, and AI Marketing Tools, accessible through a single dashboard.

articles.title: Ranveer Singh\u0026#039;s Rangeela: Dhurandhar actor launches \u0026#039;unapologetically original\u0026#039; vodka brand, 750ml bottle is priced at Rs...
articles.author: DNA India
articles.summary: Ranveer Singh launched RANGEELA, a new premium vodka brand, in India. This represents a new product introduction into the Indian market.

articles.title: OnePlus 15 first look and quick review - Design, performance and cameras! 😍
articles.summary: OnePlus 15, powered by Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5, features DetailMax Engine for enhanced photo quality, replacing the Hasselblad partnership. The smartphone has a flat-sided design similar to OnePlus 13s and is available in Sandstorm, Purple, and Black colors. Camera samples were taken in Singapore.

articles.title: EXCLUSIVE: 'I'm a beauty editor - these are the best make-up and skincare brands for teenagers'
articles.author: Hannah Britt
articles.summary: Sol de Janeiro's body creams, Bubble's acne solutions, Charlotte Tilbury's glowy looks, Byoma's focus on skin barrier health, Spots & Stripes' teen-specific products, Sundae's shower foam, and Rare Beauty's mental health focus are highlighted as desirable beauty product lines for young people. These brands offer products with unique features like appealing scents, effective formulas, and bright packaging.

articles.title: How Tan Removal Soap Helps Restore Your Natural Skin Tone After Sun Exposure
articles.author: Ne Now News
articles.summary: Pokonut has launched a new Tan Removal Soap designed to gently exfoliate, brighten, and hydrate skin exposed to the sun. The soap contains natural ingredients like goat milk, coffee granules, licorice extract, shea butter, and coconut oil and is designed for daily use on the face and body to restore natural skin tone.

articles.title: Picsart Expands Creative Platform With AI Products to Empower and Accelerate Vibe Design at Scale
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Picsart has introduced two new AI-powered products, Picsart Assistant and Picsart Flows, designed to accelerate vibe design and simplify creative workflows. Picsart Assistant enables design through natural conversation, while Picsart Flows offers an infinite canvas for scaling creations, incorporating tools for image, copy, and video editing. These products aim to empower users to create at scale and thrive in the content-first economy.

articles.title: EngageLab Email Expands Global Footprint with New Turkey Data Center, Enhancing Service for Worldwide Customers
articles.author: Engage Lab
articles.summary: EngageLab Email has launched a new data center in Istanbul, Turkey to provide faster and more stable email communication for businesses expanding into international markets. This addition completes EngageLab's core computing and storage layout in the Eurasian and African intersection region, improving localized, low-latency email delivery and enhancing email reputation.

articles.title: Consensus and Trupeer Launch AI Video Content to Revolutionize Product Demos
articles.author: Consensus
articles.summary: Consensus launched AI Video Content, powered by Trupeer, integrating studio-quality video creation and automation into their platform. This new service enables teams to produce professional product demos and documentation faster and at scale by transforming screen recordings into polished videos with AI voiceovers, visual enhancements, and multilingual support.

articles.title: Baddies R Us: A symbol of empowerment for women
articles.author: Neenma Ebeledike
articles.summary: Promise B. Mae launched "Baddies R Us," a new upscale beauty bar in South Sacramento, designed to empower women. The salon aims to provide a luxurious experience within the neighborhood and showcase women-owned brands. The grand opening of the salon was celebrated on October 25.

articles.title: Chinese toymakers blend AI with cultural elements for international success
articles.author: People Daily
articles.summary: Companies in China are experiencing surging export orders for new toys featuring artificial intelligence and built-in programming lessons. The demand for these innovative toys is so high that production is scheduled through the first quarter of next year. AI-powered toys are being quickly purchased by distributors upon arrival at ports.

articles.title: Verizon is giving away free 43-inch Samsung TVs right now - here's how to qualify
articles.author: ZDNet
articles.summary: Verizon is offering a free Samsung TV (or another gift) with a signup for their 5G Home Ultimate plan. This promotion is part of an early Black Friday deal.

articles.title: MG car dealership opens on the outskirts of Norwich
articles.author: Ben Fieldhouse
articles.summary: Thurlow Nunn has opened a new MG dealership in Norwich, located at Jaguar House, Cromer Road. This dealership will offer the full range of MG vehicles, used cars, comprehensive servicing, and aftersales support, expanding Thurlow Nunn's MG presence in Norfolk.

articles.title: New car dealership opens on city outskirts
articles.author: Ben Fieldhouse
articles.summary: Thurlow Nunn, an automotive group, has opened a new MG dealership in Norwich, offering the full range of MG vehicles along with used cars, servicing, and aftersales support. This new location expands Thurlow Nunn's MG footprint in Norfolk, reinforcing the company's dedication to serving customers with quality service.

articles.title: Microsoft launches Xbox Cloud Gaming in India, now play console and PC games on your phone
articles.summary: Microsoft has launched Xbox Cloud Gaming in India, allowing users to play games on devices like smartphones, PCs, and smart TVs via the cloud. An Xbox Game Pass subscription is required, and Microsoft plans to partner with retailers like Samsung and LG to demo the service.

articles.title: ANTHBOT Debuts the Industry's First 4-in-1 Lawn Care Robot, Ushering in a New Era of Smart Lawn Management
articles.summary: ANTHBOT unveiled the N Series and M Series intelligent lawn care robots. The N Series is a 4-in-1 lawn care robot combining mowing, shredding, clipping collection, and leaf sweeping, and the M Series delivers robust performance in a compact design, building on the Genie Series. Global availability is scheduled to begin in March 2026.

articles.title: How to Watch HBO Max on Your TV
articles.author: Busines Newswire
articles.summary: The HBO Max streaming service can be accessed on various devices such as Samsung Smart TVs, LG Smart TVs, Android TVs, Roku devices, Amazon Fire TV/Fire Stick, and Apple TV, by downloading and installing the HBO Max application. The article provides device-specific instructions for installing and accessing the service, including signing in with account credentials to start streaming content. Some devices, such as Roku and Fire TV, offer different models that support HBO Max, while others like Fire TV integrate with voice commands to easily open the application.

articles.title: vivo Launches Official E-Store in Pakistan with Exclusive Offers and Rewards
articles.author: Sponsored
articles.summary: vivo launched its Official E-Store in Pakistan on November 11, 2025, offering a complete range of vivo smartphones with free nationwide shipping and official brand warranty. A launch campaign from November 11 to November 21, 2025, includes gifts, promotions, and a lucky draw to win the vivo V60 Lite for early shoppers.

articles.title: Ncell announces 11GB data giveaway under '11:11 Ncell App Campaign'
articles.author: THT Online
articles.summary: Ncell launched the '11:11 Ncell App Campaign' on November 11, offering 11GB of free data to 11 lucky customers who recharge or purchase packs worth Rs 200 or more via the Ncell App. This campaign celebrates the global 11:11 shopping festival and promotes digital engagement through Ncell's self-care app.

articles.title: Digital Sovereignty: Microsoft's Efforts to Reassure Europeans
articles.summary: An American firm launched a new series of cloud services and features. The firm aims to reassure its European customers with these new offerings.

articles.title: 'AI did my nails in 20 minutes - I was amazed by the results but something wasn't right'
articles.author: Niamh Kirk
articles.summary: Umia is launching its "AI manicure machine" in the UK during British Beauty Week (October 18-26). The machine offers a quick gel manicure in about 20 minutes, applying base, color, and top coats using a camera to scan the nail and costing less than a regular manicure. Umia envisions the device in locations like hair salons, coffee shops, spas, and airports.

articles.title: VCAT AI Officially Launches "CREAGEN," a Conversational AI Solution for Image and Video Generation  Nov. 11, 2025 08:00
articles.summary: VCAT AI Corp. has launched CREAGEN, a new conversational AI solution for image and video generation. CREAGEN integrates a GPT-5–powered conversational interface with over 30 AI generation models, enabling users to create visuals and videos by simply talking to AI. The platform aims to streamline creative workflows and reduce costs for brands.

articles.title: VCAT AI Officially Launches "CREAGEN," a Conversational AI Solution for Image and Video Generation
articles.author: VCAT.AI
articles.summary: VCAT AI Corp. has launched CREAGEN, a conversational AI solution for image and video generation that integrates a GPT-5–powered conversational interface with over 30 global AI generation models. This platform allows users to create brand-level visuals and videos by conversing with AI, and aims to reduce costs, ensure professional consistency, and maintain brand coherence. VCAT AI also operates CREAGEN Lab, an AI-powered video production service for tailor-made creative projects.

articles.title: Partner launches Partner tv+ – an upgraded television service with exclusive content
articles.author: YINON BEN SHUSHAN
articles.summary: Partner is introducing Partner tv+, a novel television service. This service boasts a redesigned interface, a revamped application, and exclusive content offerings.

articles.title: Taiwan Show Wood Platform's AI-AR Innovation Secured 'Best Technical Achievement' at New York Digital Awards
org: Small and Medium Enterprise and Startup Administration
Show Wood Service Team Cultural Path Ltd
articles.summary: Culture Path Co., Ltd. has won the Silver Award for 'Best Technical Achievement' at the New York Digital Awards for its innovative service platform, 'Show Wood'. Show Wood uses AI scanning technology to generate 3D models and a Web 3D/AR feature for online shopping, allowing consumers to project furniture models into their spaces.

articles.title: Return Zero was finally selected as the "Startup of the Year" in the "D-Camp Startup OI #Financial S..
articles.author: Lee Young-Wook
articles.summary: ReturnZero offers "VITO," which converts call voice to text, and "CALLABO," an AI conference record service. Namdo Market provides a global B2B matching service and wholesale management tools, including "Namdo Market", "ND Uncle" and "Fashion On." Ames automates insurance product launches and AI screening. Big Tech Plus offers HomeQ for real estate asset management, and Antok offers "Antok MRI," an AI analysis solution for financial data.

articles.title: 73 Best Stocking Stuffers For 2025
articles.author: Buzz Feed
articles.summary: The article showcases various new and unique product offerings, including Mini Brands collectibles resembling popular grocery items, Squishmallows for sensory play, aromatherapy shower bombs, and personalized pet socks. It also features practical items like multi-functional tool pens and tech accessories such as Nintendo Switch Joy-Con covers and rechargeable candle lighters. These products provide options for gifts and novel items across various categories.

articles.title: 8 Nude lipsticks for a subtle look: Choose from the 4 star rated options on Amazon India
articles.author: Shweta Pandey
articles.summary: The article highlights several nude lipstick options from different brands like Maybelline, Lakme, Revlon, L'Oréal, MARS, and Swiss Beauty. These lipsticks offer various finishes, including matte, satin, and creamy, with features like long-lasting color, moisturizing formulas, and suitability for different skin tones. User feedback and key features of each product are also noted, providing information for consumers looking to purchase nude lipsticks.

articles.title: The Potential of Telegram Advertisement in Modern Marketing
articles.author: Lenora Singh
articles.summary: Telegram ad networks offer businesses a new method to reach niche audiences through channel advertising, bot advertising and group ads. These Telegram advertising features provide businesses with a unique platform to reach their audience, interact with customers and build relationships due to privacy options and high rates of user interaction.

articles.title: The talking brand: how AI video agents are reshaping customer engagement
articles.author: Daily Excelsior
articles.summary: Pippit has launched a video agent product that allows brands to create realistic, AI-powered avatars for engaging with customers. These video agents, created through Pippit's platform, can be used for various applications such as interactive onboarding, e-commerce assistance, and customer service, offering a personalized and immersive brand experience.

articles.title: Bring An Added Layer Of Elegance Into The Kitchen With These Types Of Fruit Bowls
articles.author: Tasting Table
articles.summary: Amazon Ads has expanded its AI-powered Video Generator to India, Canada, France, Germany, Italy, Mexico, Spain, and the United Kingdom. The Video Generator enables businesses to create high-quality video ads by uploading product images or videos.

articles.title: Natural Desires Soap Company Recognized as Best Natural Soap Company in the U.S. for 2025
articles.summary: Natural Desires Soap Company has been recognized as the Best Natural Soap Company in the United States for 2025. This award acknowledges the company's commitment to providing natural, chemical-free skincare solutions. The company's product line includes soaps, lotions, scrubs, and body butters, all crafted with natural ingredients.

articles.title: Amazon Ads brings AI Video Generator to India, opening new doors for SMBs
articles.author: Shantanu David
articles.summary: Amazon Ads has launched its AI-powered Video Generator in India and globally, enabling advertisers to easily create high-quality video ads. The tool, accessible through Creative Studio, uses product information to automatically generate videos, democratizing video advertising for businesses of all sizes and those who were previously unable to afford the video productions.

articles.title: How to use Amazon Ads AI Video Generator in India
articles.author: Bestmediainfo Bureau
articles.summary: Amazon Ads has launched its AI-powered Video Generator internationally, enabling businesses to create high-quality video ads within minutes. This tool transforms product images or videos into engaging, multi-scene videos with music and animations and is available at no additional cost for Sponsored Brands video. Brands using Video Generator have seen significant benefits, with a four times increase in campaigns submitted in Q3 2025 compared to Q2 2025.

articles.title: The Amd Strix Halo Mini-Pc Significantly Outperforms Nvidia's $4,000 Dgx Spark in Terms of Price-Performance Ratio.
articles.author: igor´s LAB
articles.summary: NVIDIA unveiled DGX Spark, a compact supercomputing system designed for local AI tasks. This system represents NVIDIA's initial effort to provide high-end AI performance in a smaller, portable form factor. DGX Spark utilizes NVIDIA's new GB10 architecture, aiming for efficiency and high throughput with large language models.

articles.title: Building trust through technology: Novaluxia's human-centered e-commerce vision
articles.summary: NOVALUXIA launched the NOVA-LIGHT Women Empowerment Initiative, offering digital skills training and employment opportunities. The company also plans to launch NOVA-SELECT co-branded products with local brands. These initiatives are part of NOVALUXIA's three-year strategic roadmap.

articles.title: LG U+ has introduced interactive voice search using artificial intelligence (AI) on its IPTV.LG U+ a..
articles.author: Jeong Hojun
articles.summary: LG U+ has updated the voice search function of its IPTV service 'U+tv' using its AI system 'ixi'. The update introduces conversational search capabilities, allowing users to refine searches and control playback via voice commands. AI now suggests content based on conversation context, improving user convenience.

articles.title: The AI train has left the station. Are Indian agencies on it?
articles.summary: Agencies are actively integrating AI tools like Midjourney, Gemini, Veo3, and ChatGPT to enhance creative processes.  AI talent studio Xicoia created Tilly Norwood, a virtual actress. The use of AI also extends to creating advertisement films like Coca-Cola's 'New Guy' campaign.

articles.title: Why companies will just keep nudging you to try AI
articles.summary: OpenAI is promoting its new Atlas web browser on ChatGPT.com. Perplexity is offering free access to articles through its web browser on news websites. Both companies, along with Google, are paying phone manufacturers to install their chatbot apps on new phones.

articles.title: Our AI engine helps brands make decisions at 'Quick-Commerce-Like' speed, says Satyam Krishna, GobbleCube
articles.author: Shipra Malhotra
articles.summary: GobbleCube introduced GobbsGPT, an AI co-pilot for CXOs, designed to diagnose campaign performance and suggest actionable strategies. This launch accompanies improvements including real-time alerting and conversational insights achieved through GobbleCube's data platform.

articles.title: Trader Joe's Shoppers Are Divided Over This New $10 Treat
articles.author: The Capital Journal
articles.summary: Trader Joe's introduces new seasonal items throughout the fall and winter.

articles.title: VCAT AI Officially Launches "CREAGEN," a Conversational AI Solution for Image and Video Generation
articles.author: Pr Newswire
articles.summary: VCAT AI Corp. launched CREAGEN, a conversational AI solution for image and video generation, enabling brands to create high-quality content through natural conversation. CREAGEN has already been adopted by major brands including Lotte and Samsung Electronics for campaign videos and branded content. In addition to the self-service platform, VCAT AI also operates CREAGEN Lab, an AI-powered video production service.

articles.title: David Hayes Launches Babeltext to Expand Access to AI Globally
articles.summary: Babeltext, founded by David Hayes, has launched a platform that allows users to interact with AI through messaging apps in 195 languages. The platform aims to bridge communication gaps and enable actions, offering a seamless transition from automated assistance to human support. It integrates with services like AWS Bedrock.

articles.title: 43 Gifts For People Who Spend All Day At Their Desks
articles.author: Jonathan Mazzei
articles.summary: Several new products are designed for work from home. Nespresso is offering the Vertuo coffee and espresso maker. Rocketbook provides a smart reusable notebook. There is also wireless Bluetooth earbuds and a colorful wireless keyboard and mouse set available to make working at a computer more enjoyable.

articles.title: Shopper thrilled after scoring premium item for cheap at local thrift store: 'I couldn't believe it'
articles.author: Matthew Swigonski
articles.summary: A shopper found a Zojirushi bread maker and a Zojirushi Neuro Fuzzy rice cooker at a thrift store. The rice cooker model is listed for just under $260 on Zojirushi's online store. The shopper was excited about finding the appliances for a lower price than new.

articles.title: I unboxed OnePlus 15 ahead of November 13 India launch: Watch the video here
articles.author: Hindustan Times
articles.summary: OnePlus is launching the OnePlus 15 in India on November 13. The device features a refreshed design and a Snapdragon 8 Gen 4 performance upgrade.

articles.title: Big Games That Desperately Need Switch 2 Updates In 2026
articles.author: Game Rant
articles.summary: Nintendo launched the Nintendo Switch 2, featuring new versions of classic Switch games.

articles.title: FROM GROVE TO TABLE
articles.author: Erum Noor Muzaffar
org: IU International University of Applied Sciences
articles.summary: Loralai Olives has launched 'Fajr', a new product line featuring unique packaging styles and multiple EVOO varieties. 'Fajr' retains the maximum polyphenols and nutrients through minimal processing and cold extraction, making it one of the purest forms of Extra Virgin Olive Oil available in Pakistan. This launch signifies an expansion of Loralai Olives' product offerings in the Pakistani market.

articles.title: Lil Kitchen Goes Bite-Sized With New Mini Sandwiches Selection
articles.summary: Lil Kitchen in Chill Out, Lotus Fifth District, has introduced new mini sandwiches. These include fried chicken in pillowy buns, a Cheetos-crusted version, Hulk Chicken with garlic mayo, a classic chicken sandwich, and burger mini selections. The sandwiches are designed for easy snacking and sharing.

articles.title: Apple's Unusual iPhone Pocket Is a $150 3D-Knitted Fashion Statement
articles.author: Peta Pixel
articles.summary: Apple introduced the iPhone Pocket, a stretchy, sock-like accessory designed to carry an iPhone and other pocketable items. It functions as both a case and a fashion accessory.

articles.title: GoPro Max 2, Lit Hero, Fluid Pro AI Gimbal Launched in India at This Price
articles.author: NDTV
articles.summary: GoPro launched three new products in India on Tuesday. These products include the GoPro Max 2, a 360-degree action camera; the Lit Hero, a lightweight action camera; and the Fluid Pro AI Gimbal.

articles.title: श्‍लोक हिमालयन प्रिमियम ह्विस्की बजारमा
articles.author: कान्तिपुर संवाददाता
articles.summary: A company has introduced a new whisky named 'Shlok,' which has been matured in Quercus Alba wood barrels. The whisky provides a balanced blend of honey, vanilla, caramel, and smoky flavor notes. Shlok is currently available in 750ml, 180ml, and 90ml sizes, priced at Rs 2,860, Rs 715, and Rs 360, respectively.
